localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: See errors, warnings, and logs as they happen on your site — without having to open the browser’s console. Find bugs you didn't know were there via notifications in toast format.
blogPost.body: See errors, warnings, and logs as they happen on your site — without having to open the browser’s console. Find bugs you didn't know were there via notifications in toast format.
blogPost.title: toast.log 2.0 - Get console errors right on your page (as toasts)
blogPost.author: Guilherme Rizzo

localize.description: 无需打开浏览器控制台，即可查看站点上发生的错误、警告和日志。通过Toast格式的通知查找您不知道的bug。
localize.tagline: 将控制台错误直接显示在您的页面上(作为祝酒词)

localize.description: 無需打開瀏覽器控制檯，即可查看站點上發生的錯誤、警告和日誌。通過Toast格式的通知查找您不知道的bug。
localize.tagline: 將控制檯錯誤直接顯示在您的頁面上(作爲祝酒詞)

previous.excerpt: Pika (pronounced pi·kuh, like picker) is an easy to use, open-source, native colour picker for macOS. Pika makes it simple to quickly find colours on screen, in the format you need, so you can get on with being a speedy, successful designer.
previous.title: Pika - An open-source colour picker app for macOS

localize.description: Pika（发音为pi-kuh，像picker）是一款简单易用、开源的macOS原生色彩采集器。Pika让你在屏幕上快速找到你所需要的格式的颜色变得很简单，所以你可以继续成为一个快速、成功的设计师。
localize.tagline: 一款适用于macOS的开源颜色挑选器应用。

localize.description: Pika（發音爲pi-kuh，像picker）是一款簡單易用、開源的macOS原生色彩採集器。Pika讓你在屏幕上快速找到你所需要的格式的顏色變得很簡單，所以你可以繼續成爲一個快速、成功的設計師。
localize.tagline: 一款適用於macOS的開源顏色挑選器應用。

next.excerpt: AirConsole Meet lets you instantly play games with your team in Zoom, Google Meet or any other video conferencing service. The games allow colleagues to bond together while working from home. Perfect for team building during the pandemic.
next.title: AirConsole Meet - Play games in video calls with your team

localize.description: AirConsole Meet让您可以在Zoom、Google Meet或任何其他视频会议服务中与您的团队即时玩游戏。这些游戏可以让同事们在家中工作的同时团结在一起。非常适合在流行病期间进行团队建设。
localize.tagline: 与你的团队在视频通话中玩游戏

localize.description: AirConsole Meet讓您可以在Zoom、Google Meet或任何其他視頻會議服務中與您的團隊即時玩遊戲。這些遊戲可以讓同事們在家中工作的同時團結在一起。非常適合在流行病期間進行團隊建設。
localize.tagline: 與你的團隊在視頻通話中玩遊戲
